BU APTAL OYUNA NİYE GERİ BAĞLANAMIYORUM DÜZGÜN YAPIN ŞU OYUNU KAÇ YILLIK OYUN KAÇ MİLYAR DOLARLIK FİRMA BİR BOKU DÜZELTEMİYORSUNUZ TEBRİKLER!
The best game in the history of videogames

I play this game around 500 hours. (this is my new account).
Gameplay is beautiful and I'm sure I'm going to play this game for years.
In this game you can't be bored.
You can play competitive and wingman (2v2 competitive) matches, deathmatches, danger zone (cs:go battle royale) and wargames (something like cs:go minigames) servers and more...
Updates come almost every month and something always happens.
But this game has BIG problems:
Cheaters:
Yes, anticheat is better than in the past, but hey, it still doesn't work well.
In wingman is anticheat worst. I have cheaters almost every game.
One wonderful day i just play wingman match and one dude just spin like a helicopter.
In competitive matches, anticheat is not bad, average.
Trust Factor:
I'm not going to explain what trust factor is, so if you want, search it on Google.
I just played a game with some cheater and my trust factor was next game yellow.
So i just play a game and next game i have red trustfactor.
Tf.
Valve please fix it.
But yeah, I love this game.
BTW: Sorry for my English, I'm from Slovakia.
un clasico y juego tan competitivo le heche buenas horas y aun volviendolo a jugar siento lo mismo como del primer dia
